body: From what i can infer, its a typical harem with 5+ females and 2 dudes but in this harem both guys take turns fucking the females.

so in short the blue haired dude was the  previous owner of the mansion and somehow  those 5 girls were his harem and he suddenly left then the new dude came and inherited his  mansion and harem then the brown haired girl was conflicted  since she was in love with the new dude and decided to run so  that way she won't be fucked  again by the blue haired dude.
